content.body:
## Redundancy:

There may be a slight delay when the webhook notification is sent. We will retry the send 3x before failing out . 

## Performance:

Webhook sender has a 500 milliseconds timeout. We recommend queueing the webhook message and processing them later on.

## Security Verification:

Webhook request will contain an HTTP header field including a security key in it. You should use this to verify the origin of the API call to make sure it’s sending from a legitimate source.

**HTTP Header:** \
**TR-SecretKey:** HookKey]
**Cus\
**Custom HTTP Header**

## Receiving a webhook notification:

Webhook will be a HTTP POST with a JSON payload where applicable. 

```json JSON Structure
{
  	"id": "evt_1C2RZD2eZvKYlo2CicCsmlid",
    "eventType": "dailyWorkout.completed",
 	"created": "2016-01-01 12:32:12"   // UTC time of when event happened,
    "data": {
	    // this part is the payload
	    "userID": 123,
	    "dailyWorkoutID": 123,
	    "status": "tracked",
        ….		
	}
}
```
